column2: In this campaign, all non-vanilla casus belli "cooldown" periods will be disabled for all rulers.\n
The 'No CB Cooldowns' customization is in effect.\n

This scenario customization decision allows you to DISABLE all non-vanilla "cooldown" periods which block successive usage of certain CBs (e.g., holy war, county conquest, pagan subjugation, and tribal invasion) for arbitrary periods of time (usually 5 years).
